In sidebery settings set:
1) Show new tab buttons -> off
2) Appearance => Mouse:
	- Use horizontal scroll to -> switch panels
	- limit to one panel switch per scroll
3) Style:

```
#root.root {--frame-bg: transparent;}
#root.root {--toolbar-bg: rgba(0,0,0,0);}

:root {
  background-color: transparent;
}

#root.root {--general-border-radius: 7px;}


/* Replacing Sidebery 'settings' with Fluent settings icon to blend with Arc (Windows) aesthetic. */
.NavigationBar #settings.nav-item .icon {
  fill: transparent;
  background-color: var(--nav-btn-fg);
  width: 60%;
  height: 60%;
  mask: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
}

/* Replacing 'add tabs panel' button with Fluent plus icon to mimic Arc's 'new space' button. */
.NavigationBar #add_tp.nav-item .icon {
  fill: transparent;
  background-color: var(--nav-btn-fg);
  width: 60%;
  height: 60%;
  mask: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
}
```
